mapper.select: select pd.protocol__c as protocolNum , sr.status as protocolStatus , pd.srvc_type as serviceType , (pd.srvc_arrival_date::timestamp)::varchar as serviceArrivaldate , (pd.srvc_start_date::timestamp)::varchar as serviceStartdate , pd.srvc_duration as serviceDuration , (pd.srvc_delivery_date::timestamp)::varchar as serviceDeliverydate , pd.srvc_status_cd as serviceStatus , a2.dealercode__c as dealerCode , a2.corporaterepresentativename__c as dealerName , pas.carregistrationnumber__c as vehiclePlate , pas.friendly_model__c as vehicleModel , pas.modelyear__c as vehicleModelyear , pas.manufacturedate as vehicleManufacyear , (select ci.val from process.color_information ci where ci.lang_id__c = 'ENU' and ci."type" = 'AUTO_EXTERIOR' and ci.name_code = pas.vehiclecolor__c) as vehicleExtcolor , pas.serialnumber as vehicleChassi , (select concat(a2.firstname || ' ' || a2.lastname ) from process.contact pc where row_id = pd.srvc_consultant_id) as consultantName , (select concat(pc.firstname || ' ' || pc.lastname ) from process.contact pc where row_id = pd.srvc_technician_id) as technicianName from process.dealer_appointment_history pd join process.service_request sr on pd.protocol__c = sr.protocol__c join process.account a1 on a1.row_id = sr.contact_row_id__c join process.account a2 on a2.row_id = sr.account_row_id__c join process.asset pas on pas.contact_row_id__c = a1.row_id where a1.cpf__c = #{cpf}
